title: Koko Pops: Koko's history of music
creator_credit: Film Australia, Robin Hughes, Don Ezard and Antoinette Starkiewicz
brief_description: A brief and bright animated history of music. Divided into brief vignettes, each with colourful characters dancing and/or playing music, it absorbs the viewer in a mixture of musical styles including primitive, pan flutes, Baroque, romantic, circus music, jazz, French popular, opera and variations of modern music.
